document.full_text: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa on monday reiterated that japan's economy is likely to return to a recovery path once supply constraints caused by last month's earthquake and tsunami ease, and as exports grow.
document.title: boj shirakawa says recovery path intact, regional
lines_and_colors: bank of japan governor masaaki shirakawa on monday reiterated that japan's economy is likely to return to a recovery path once supply constraints caused by last month's earthquake and tsunami ease, and as exports grow.
